pkgmetadata.longdescription: # peeringdb-py[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/peeringdb.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/peeringdb)[![Tests](https://github.com/peeringdb/peeringdb-py/workflows/tests/badge.svg)](https://github.com/peeringdb/peeringdb-py)[![Codecov](https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/github/peeringdb/peeringdb-py/master.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://codecov.io/github/peeringdb/peeringdb-py)PeeringDB python clientWe have an installation guide on our [documentation site](https://docs.peeringdb.com/howto/peeringdb-py/).
